page.title: 16BUSBY:SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: There is great concern over the Rates,a form of{property tax.}There has been a vast increase much to the disapproval of the community.A {rateable value}is given to each property taking into account size and amenities.An appropriate{rate}is then set at so many pence in the pound;the present rate is 59p in the pound.For a house valued at Â£1,000 you would have to pay Â£590.Rates along with{taxes paid to the Government pay for services such as education. Another concern is the{strikes}by {teachers}in schools in the area.This has badly affected some of the Secondary Schools attended by pupils in the area(Williamwood and Mearns Castle High Schools).This is because the strikes have been concentrated in areas such as this whose Member of Parliament is a Government Minister.
